verbs.description: [ARG0: South Korea] [V: says] [ARG1: in last week 's talks , North Korea 's Kim said he 'd give up his nuclear weapons in exchange for an American promise not to strike . Trump administration says it 's not taking North Korean leader at his word]

South Korea says in last week 's talks , [ARG0: North Korea 's Kim] [V: said] [ARG1: he 'd give up his nuclear weapons in exchange for an American promise not to strike] . Trump administration says it 's not taking North Korean leader at his word
